page.title: 09CONSERVATION IN ST.WENN
page.content: Our area is rich in{wildlife,plants {trees and creatures.}Farmers are keenly aware of their privileged position as guardians of our natural heritage.Many small holding are not economically viable and as a result farmers are removing hedges and combining small fields into more workable units.Many of the fields on the old parish map have disappeared as have some of the farms and small holdings. The farmers are creating areas for wildlife by allowing some{corners of {fields}to remain undisturbed.{Ponds have been deepened or created to encourage aquatic creatures.The {woodlands}are well protected and the area is relatively free of visitors who could cause damage unknowingly. A healthy balance between nature conservation and economy is achieved.
